metadata.description: Personal collection of Claude Code plugins for iOS/SwiftUI development and workflow automation

plugins.name: swiftui-dev
plugins.description: Comprehensive SwiftUI development toolkit for iOS 18+/macOS 15+ with Swift 6 patterns, SwiftData, Liquid Glass support, and test automation

plugins.name: dev-workflow
plugins.description: Workflow orchestration for mobile and macOS development - manages TDD cycles, quality gates, visual verification, and context preservation. Enforces hard quality gates including mandatory visual verification with screenshots. Integrates with swiftui-dev for complete development lifecycle management.
